title: Wanted : Phone Finder for Wear
summary: Stop looking for your smartphone through your Android Wear Watch
description: Your smartphone is lost in your bag, or underneath the cushions of your couch? Look no further! Simply use this app with your Android Wear watch.This concept already exists, but this app has advantages over its competitors:- No ads, 100% free- No useless permissions (no internet)  - Open source - Silent Features: Flashing Screen and Vibrate- Synchronized opening and closing - Stop on close- Opening above the lock (the smartphone remains blocked) Source code : https://github.com/ChrOnOs83/Android-Wanted
descriptionHTML:
Your smartphone is lost in your bag, or underneath the cushions of your couch? Look no further! Simply use this app with your Android Wear watch.

This concept already exists, but this app has advantages over its competitors:
- No ads, 100% free
- No useless permissions (no internet)
- Open source
- Silent Features: Flashing Screen and Vibrate
- Synchronized opening and closing
- Stop on close
- Opening above the lock (the smartphone remains blocked)

Source code : https://github.com/ChrOnOs83/Android-Wanted
comments: Great app Have a Samsung note3 and moto 360 and works great
